channel.title: Vocabularies on Josh’s Site
channel.description: Recent content in Vocabularies on Josh’s Site

item.title: Basic Vocabularies of Taiwanese Hokkien
item.description: Pronouns Personal Hokkien English Translation 我guá “I” 阮guán/gún Exclusive “we”—us, but not you.Also used as genetive, “my,” “ours” 㑑lán Inclusive “we”—you, me, and possibly others.Also used as genetive, “ours” 汝lí Singular “You” 恁lín Plural “You”—all of you 伊i “He/she” 𪜶in “They” 啥儂siánn lâng, siáng/siâng “Who” Demonstrative Hokkien English Translation 這tse “This” 這寡、遮其tsit kuá, tsia ê “These” 彼he “That” 彼寡、遐其hit kuá, hia ê “Those” 啥、啥物、啥貨siánn, siánn mih, siánn huè/hè “What” 遮tsia “Here”1 遐hia “There”1 底、底位tó, tó uī “Where”1 Determiners Demonstrative Hokkien English Translation 這…tsit… “This…” 彼…hit… “That…” 底…tó… “Which…” 啥…/啥物…siánn…/siánn mih… “What…” Indefinite Hokkien English Translation 無～bô… “No…” 所有～sóo ū… “Every…” 有～ū… “Some…” 任何～jīm hô… “Any…” 別～pát… “Other…” Interrogatives Hokkien English translation 當時、底時tang sî, tī sî “When”2 焉怎án tsuánn “How”—in what way 偌…jua…/gua…/lua… “How…”—to what extend 爲啥、是焉怎uī siánn, sī án tsuánn “Why” 曷、曷使、曷著áh, áh sái, áh tióh “Why should” 敢…kám… “Whether…” Suffix Hokkien English translation …其…ê Genetive form “-’s” …家己…ka kī/tī Reflexive form “-self” 「遮」,「遐」, and「底、底位」are actually corresponding to “this/that/what place” in English as “here/there/where” are adverbs that mean “at this/that/what place.
